answer: There are multiple stats to compare in order to determine which is the best ammunition in DayZ, but on a general note, 7.62x54mmR is the best, as it's pretty common to find and packs a serious punch. Next would be .308.
Mosin uses 7.62x54mmR ammunition. It is not only best in terms of damage, but also very common to find. Can be found in any of the following areas: Farm, Hunting, Town, Village.
VSD uses 7.62x54mmR ammunition. It is not only best in terms of damage, but also very common to find. Can be found in any of the following areas: Farm, Hunting, Town, Village.
Ammo types found in DayZ: 9x19mm, .357, .45 ACP, .380 ACP, .308 WIN, .22 LR, Flare, 12ga, 5.56x45mm, 5.45x39mm, 7.62x39mm, 9x39mm.
